results.title: M
results.brief_description: In this classic German thriller, Hans Beckert, a serial killer who preys on children, becomes the focus of a massive Berlin police manhunt. Beckert’s heinous crimes are so repellant and disruptive to city life that he is even targeted by the underworld.

constellations_other.name: Significant sounds
constellations_other.description: The arrival of synchronised sound dramatically changed the movie business, allowing filmmakers to use sound in new and exciting ways which developed the use sound into own film language.

results.description: In this classic German thriller, Hans Beckert, a serial killer who preys on children, becomes the focus of a massive Berlin police manhunt. Beckert’s heinous crimes are so repellant and disruptive to city life that he is even targeted by others in the seedy underworld network. With both cops and criminals in pursuit, the murderer soon realizes that people are on his trail, sending him into a tense, panicked attempt to escape justice.
description_for_label: In this classic German thriller, Hans Beckert, a serial killer who preys on children, becomes the focus of a massive Berlin police manhunt. Beckert’s heinous crimes are so repellant and disruptive to city life that he is even targeted by others in the seedy underworld network. With both cops and criminals in pursuit, the murderer soon realizes that people are on his trail, sending him into a tense, panicked attempt to escape justice.

results.title: Loves of Casanova
results.creator_credit: Noë Bloch, Alexandre Volkoff, Ivan Mosjoukine, Norbert Falk, Société des Cinéromans, Deulig Film and Ciné-Alliance
results.brief_description: Republic of Venice, 1760. Pursued by a vengeful husband, the intrepid womanizer Casanova, who symbolizes the decline of the city and its fall into debauchery, manages to escape and, by a circuitous route, arrives in Saint Petersburg, where he will be involved in the many plots that threaten the throne of Czar Peter III…

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Noë Bloch, Alexandre Volkoff, Ivan Mosjoukine, Norbert Falk, Société des Cinéromans, Deulig Film and Ciné-Alliance
results.description: Republic of Venice, 1760. results.title: Love, Death & Robots
results.brief_description: Terrifying creatures, wicked surprises and dark comedy converge in this NSFW anthology of animated stories presented by Tim Miller and David Fincher.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

results.description: Terrifying creatures, wicked surprises and dark comedy converge in this NSFW anthology of animated stories presented by Tim Miller and David Fincher.
description_for_label: Terrifying creatures, wicked surprises and dark comedy converge in this NSFW anthology of animated stories presented by Tim Miller and David Fincher.

results.title: Love Is the Message, the Message Is Death
results.brief_description: Love Is the Message, The Message Is Death reflects Jafa’s desire to craft a “black cinema” that is responsive to the “existential, political, and spiritual dimensions” of Black life, comprised of found footage sampled from films, newscasts, sporting events, music videos, and citizen videos.

constellations_other.name: Now watch this
constellations_other.description: In a video-saturated world, how do you keep focus? Do you keep a close eye on one thing, or step back and watch the parade of images go by, to see the whole thing?

constellations_other.name: Copy, transform and combine
constellations_other.description: You will see me (2020) repurposes material sourced from the history of the moving image – archival footage, news, interviews, documentaries, reality TV, video diaries and social media – to reflect on the way we perform in front of and reveal ourselves to the camera.

results.title_for_label: Love Is the Message, the Message Is Death
results.description: A reflection on Jafa’s desire to craft a “black cinema” that is responsive to the “existential, political, and spiritual dimensions” of Black life. Comprised of found footage sampled from films, newscasts, sporting events, music videos, and citizen videos, all of it downloaded from the Internet, the clips have been woven together and set to Kanye West’s anthem “Ultralight Beam.” Together the images and music make for an intense, poignant meditation on African American life in the twentieth-century. This history is also the history, by necessity, of racism and prejudice.
description_for_label: A reflection on Jafa’s desire to craft a “black cinema” that is responsive to the “existential, political, and spiritual dimensions” of Black life. Comprised of found footage sampled from films, newscasts, sporting events, music videos, and citizen videos, all of it downloaded from the Internet, the clips have been woven together and set to Kanye West’s anthem “Ultralight Beam.” Together the images and music make for an intense, poignant meditation on African American life in the twentieth-century. This history is also the history, by necessity, of racism and prejudice.

results.title: Lost Highway
results.headline_credit: France and United States of America, 1997
results.brief_description: A tormented jazz musician finds himself lost in an enigmatic story involving murder, surveillance, gangsters, doppelgangers, and an impossible transformation inside a prison cell.
results.description: A tormented jazz musician finds himself lost in an enigmatic story involving murder, surveillance, gangsters, doppelgangers, and an impossible transformation inside a prison cell.
description_for_label: A tormented jazz musician finds himself lost in an enigmatic story involving murder, surveillance, gangsters, doppelgangers, and an impossible transformation inside a prison cell.

results.title: Los Angeles Plays Itself
results.brief_description: From its distinctive neighborhoods to its architectural homes, Los Angeles has been the backdrop to countless movies. In this dazzling work, Andersen takes viewers on a whirlwind tour through the metropolis’ real and cinematic history, investigating the myriad stories and legends that have come to define it, and meticulously, judiciously revealing the real city that lives beneath.
results.description: From its distinctive neighborhoods to its architectural homes, Los Angeles has been the backdrop to countless movies. In this dazzling work, Andersen takes viewers on a whirlwind tour through the metropolis’ real and cinematic history, investigating the myriad stories and legends that have come to define it, and meticulously, judiciously revealing the real city that lives beneath.

results.title: Lords of Dogtown
results.creator_credit: Cindy Evans, Chris Gorak, Stacy Peralta, Senator International, Indelible Pictures, The Linson Company, Columbia Pictures, TriStar Pictures, Catherine Hardwicke and John Linson
results.headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 2005
results.brief_description: Lords of Dogtown tells the radical true story behind three teenage surfers from Venice Beach, California, who took skateboarding to the extreme and changed the world of sports forever.

constellations_other.name: Skate or die
constellations_other.description: Skateboarding is a subculture frequently documented, from amateur skate videos filmed with fish-eye lenses, to documentaries exploring the genesis of the subculture and gritty feature films depicting underlying social dynamics.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Cindy Evans, Chris Gorak, Stacy Peralta, Senator International, Indelible Pictures, The Linson Company, Columbia Pictures, TriStar Pictures, Catherine Hardwicke and John Linson
results.description: The radical true story behind three teenage surfers from Venice Beach, California, who took skateboarding to the extreme and changed the world of sports forever. Stacy Peralta, Tony Alva and Jay Adams are the Z-Boys, a bunch of nobodies until they create a new style of skateboarding that becomes a worldwide phenomenon. But when their hobby becomes a business, the success shreds their friendship.
description_for_label: The radical true story behind three teenage surfers from Venice Beach, California, who took skateboarding to the extreme and changed the world of sports forever. Stacy Peralta, Tony Alva and Jay Adams are the Z-Boys, a bunch of nobodies until they create a new style of skateboarding that becomes a worldwide phenomenon. But when their hobby becomes a business, the success shreds their friendship.

results.title: Local Hero
results.brief_description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don’t go as expected.

constellations_other.name: Ice Queens and Sirens of the sea
constellations_other.description: Sports stars and mythological creatures on-screen.

results.description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don’t go as expected.
description_for_label: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don’t go as expected.

results.title: Little Women
results.brief_description: With their father away as a chaplain in the Civil War, Jo, Meg, Beth and Amy grow up with their mother in somewhat reduced circumstances. They are a close family who inevitably have their squabbles and tragedies. But the bond holds even when, later, male friends start to become a part of the household.

results.title: Little Women
results.creator_credit: Jacqueline Durran, Robin Swicord, Jess Gonchor, Denise Di Novi, Amy Pascal, Greta Gerwig, Regency Enterprises, Pascal Pictures, Columbia Pictures and Sony Pictures
results.brief_description: Four sisters come of age in America in the aftermath of the Civil War.

constellations_other.name: Brilliant careers (Gillian Armstrong)
constellations_other.description: Gillian Armstrong's feature film debut not only helped launch her own acclaimed career, but those of the actors as well.
